Hi everyone,a little explanation about my humorous post which I did not writte but I wll share with you the link,read it and you will laugh,the legend whom ever he may be just hammed up the fishing world and I enjoy the thread in which I copied and posted some exerts which were inclusive to me,I even responded because this chap had noithing but good intentions of making folks laugh  Hope you enjoy Yes Lew I busted my hernia over that thread I've always believed if you have to look up to someone,then they arent worth looking at (Unless your short crothed like me    )The Legend expressed and demonstrated that very person in a Saturday Night live kinna way There's nothing better than making fun and laughing about ones self,I had to laugh and composed something that was outlandishly humourous  http://www.muskies101.com/forums/showthrea...p;goto=lastpost  Leave your clients on shore

That's it Marc ...I'm really ticked at you now.  I tell you how I feel about myself and you post it on the board.  Last time I spill my inner secrets with you bud. Any hints on how to catch the first muskie ... that bunch at Lakair aren't any help.  A rookie caught more than they did.  Right Cliff.
